# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the fact that it is worth $12000 to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11000. This is an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
